Entries.BraveLittleSapling_Scene5: Fearing for his life, and demoralised by the relentless downpour, the brave little sapling begins to lose hope...
Entries.Wumbus_Description: An absurd sci-fi comedy centred around the life and times of a lumpy guy from another star.
Entries.Wumbus_Scene7: Many scenes attempt to find humour in the absurdity of the modern lifestyle.
Entries.ZuzuCityExpress_Description: A beloved movie classic, carefully restored for modern cinemas.
